mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM user WHERE id='{id}') AS flag;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, password, name, dept, email, phone) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{dept}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.update:

phone=#{phone}
